WRITING.TITLE: Drone Close Call With Rally Car [4082 views]

WRITING.TEXT: What I know about this, tank shouldn't fly off at all.

After Xavi Cardelus fell off his bike, the bike's fuel tank was thrown on the race track where it exploded in the middle of the pack. There were no serious injuries.
Link to full video: [here](http://klipland.com/video/motorcycle-explodes-and-engulfs-racers-in-fireball-during-moto2-race-in-spain/15324)

WRITING.TITLE: Massive fireball due to crash at Motorland Aragn in Moto2

WRITING.TEXT: The bike's fuel tank exploded in the middle of the pack after Xavi Cardelus fell off his bike. It was a miracle there were no serious injuries.
Fun fact: We later spoke with rally driver and he said he didn't see a drone at all.

Totally agree with you on everything.
Pilot moved his DJI out of instinct. Later he told me few times how sorry he is for not holding drone's position where it was :)
